StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdatePTADPRASPCommandRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @CommandRecruiterId int, @Rank varchar(10) )
AS
UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.[SHIPPER] SET [CurrentRankCode] = @Rank
WHERE [SHIP_ID] = @CommandRecruiterId
UPDATE MCRISS.dbo.MARINE SET PRESENT_GRADE_CODE = PG.PAY_GRADE_CODE FROM MCRISS.dbo.MARINE M INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA N ON N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = M.MARINE_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACT C ON N.NWA_ID = C.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.SHIPPER S ON S.SHIP_ID = @CommandRecruiterId INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PAY_GRADE PG ON PG.RANK_CODE = @Rank WHERE N.NWA_ID IN ( SELECT MAX(N2.NWA_ID) FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA N2 WHERE N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = N2.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID)
